game.name: Did you visit CommutatorApply
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The "Act of Oblivion" has occurred. A toxic reagent now dwells within everyone. Stand your post and ask: "Did you visit commutatorapply?" Their eyes never lie. But without eyes, the world will be shrouded in lies.
